headline: American Electric Power (AEP) Board Approves Quarterly Dividend
summary: American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) is one of the defensive stocks that billionaires are buying amid US trade tariff uncertainty. On July 22, the company’s board of directors approved a regular quarterly dividend of $0.93 per share. The dividend is payable on September 10, 2025, to shareholders of record as of August 8, 2025. […]
